org.aksw.simba.hibiscus.util

Class FedSumGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aksw.simba.hibiscus.util.FedSumGenerator

  • public class FedSumGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate HiBISCuS Summaries for a set of federation members (SPARQL endpoints)
    Author:
    saleem

      java.lang.String getObjAuthorityQury(java.lang.String predicate)
      Get a SPARQL query to retrieve all distinct objects for retrieving all distinct object authorities for a predicate Note: You need to increase the 1000 limit of results for SPARQL endpoints if the distinct subjects for a predicate is greather than that limit

                throws java.io.IOException
        initialize input information for data summaries generation
        Parameters:
        location - Directory location of the resulting FedSummaries file (i.e. location/FedSum.n3)

    • Method Detail

      • generateSummaries

        public void generateSummaries(java.util.List<java.lang.String> endpoints,
                              java.lang.String graph)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                              org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                              org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException
        Build HiBISCuS data summaries for the given list of SPARQL endpoints
        Parameters:
        endpoints - List of SPARQL endpoints url
        graph - Named graph. Can be null. In this case all named graphs will be considered for HiBISCuS summaries
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Io Error
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException - Query Execution Erro
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - Memory Error
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - Repository Error

      • writeSbjAuthority

        public void writeSbjAuthority(java.lang.String predicate,
                              java.lang.String endpoint,
                              java.lang.String graph)
                       throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                              org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                              org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Write all the distinct subject authorities having predicate p. consider rdf:type we are interested in http://www.dbpedia.com part of subject
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate
        endpoint - Endpoint URL
        graph - named Graph
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - Query Error
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - Repository Error
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException - Query Execution Error
        java.io.IOException - IO Error

      • getSbjAuthorityQury

        public java.lang.String getSbjAuthorityQury(java.lang.String predicate)
        Get a SPARQL query to retrieve all distinct subjects for retrieving all distinct subject authorities for a predicate Note: You need to increase the 1000 limit of results for SPARQL endpoints if the distinct subjects for a predicate is greather than that limit
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate
        Returns:
        query Required SPARQL query

      • getSbjAuthorityQury

        public java.lang.String getSbjAuthorityQury(java.lang.String predicate,
                                            java.lang.String graph)
        Get a SPARQL query to retrieve all distinct subjects for retrieving all distinct subject authorities for a predicate Note: You need to increase the 1000 limit of results for SPARQL endpoints if the distinct subjects for a predicate is greater than that limit
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate
        graph - Named graph
        Returns:
        query Required SPARQL query

      • writeObjAuthority

        public void writeObjAuthority(java.lang.String predicate,
                              java.lang.String endpoint,
                              java.lang.String graph)
                       throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException,
                              org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException,
                              org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Write all the distinct object authorities having predicate p. consider rdf:type we are interested in http://www.dbpedia.com part of object. Note: for rdf:type we store all the classes
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate
        endpoint - Endpoint URL
        graph - named Graph
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException - Query Error
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - Repository Error
        org.openrdf.query.QueryEvaluationException - Query Execution Error
        java.io.IOException - IO Error

      • getObjAuthorityQury

        public java.lang.String getObjAuthorityQury(java.lang.String predicate)
        Get a SPARQL query to retrieve all distinct objects for retrieving all distinct object authorities for a predicate Note: You need to increase the 1000 limit of results for SPARQL endpoints if the distinct subjects for a predicate is greather than that limit
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate
        Returns:
        query Required SPARQL query

      • getObjAuthorityQury

        public java.lang.String getObjAuthorityQury(java.lang.String predicate,
                                            java.lang.String graph)
        Get a SPARQL query to retrieve all distinct objects for retrieving all distinct object authorities for a predicate Note: You need to increase the 1000 limit of results for SPARQL endpoints if the distinct subjects for a predicate is greather than that limit
        Parameters:
        predicate - Predicate
        graph - Named graph
        Returns:
        query Required SPARQL query
